Content.Text:
<MYNAME>, good morning! I've got some
great news!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Rejoice, <MYNAME>. A new resident has
moved into town.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKOWN>Hello, <MYNAME>. I am <BLUE>Rebecca</BLUE>. I hope
we'll get along well.

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is my son. Say hello, come on!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I was going to have these two live in
the empty house in town, but then we
had that nice coincidence.
<PAGE>
Because of the forge in that house it's
better that Iroha lives there.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That means, however, that the two of
them now have nowhere to live.
<PAGE>
Therefore, I think we should all work
together to make a new house. Will you
help us out?

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm an <GREEN>Architect</GREEN>. I draw <RED>blueprints</RED>
for things like buildings.
<PAGE>
I've already got blueprints that I was
planning on using when building my own
house, so we just need the materials.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
If we all work together, I'm sure we'll
get those materials easily.
<PAGE>
With Rebecca's advice, I'm sure we'll be
able to build the house really quickly,
too.
<PAGE>
What do you think, <MYNAME>? Will you help
us out?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I knew you'd say that, <MYNAME>! Thank
you!

<FACE_REBECCA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Sorry for suddenly bringing this to you,
<MYNAME>. I'm sure that your help will
make this happen.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll get a start on collecting the
materials we need, then.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, your bag is full.
<PAGE>
You need some space to carry materials,
so can you make <BLUE>two</BLUE> spaces in your bag?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You don't have enough room. Can you make
<BLUE>two</BLUE> spaces in your bag?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The others are already in the mountains
collecting materials. Let's hurry and
meet up with them.
